# function: ipv4_ip2long

Converts an IPv4 address from dotted-decimal string form to its 32-bit integer representation.

## Example Usage

```terraform
output "ip_long" {
  value = provider::zeus::ipv4_ip2long("192.168.1.1")
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
ipv4_ip2long(ipv4_ip string) number
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `ipv4_ip` (String) IPv4 address in dotted-decimal form, e.g. 192.168.1.1
